name: Tabaxi
description: Tabaxi are feline humanoids from distant lands, known for their curiosity, agility, and wanderlust. They are natural explorers and treasure hunters, driven by an insatiable desire to see the world and gather knowledge. Tabaxi are quick and stealthy, with sharp claws and a keen sense of balance. They are often playful and unpredictable, with a strong sense of individuality.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and one additional language of your choice.
special: Feline Agility: When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you canâ€™t use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.
